name: Flat Heads
description:
Flat Heads

In this Top Down Survival,
zombies are coming to eat your brain, stomach and eyes infinitely...
You may be the last person on hearth ?

Controls :

Use the Arrow key to move and Spacebar to shoot.
Barrels appear behind you.
You can shoot them to explode and kill nearby zombies.

You can change the controls in game if you want.

Notes :

The game is still in development. Every feedback is good to take :)
